definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: They are strictly vegetarian and eat all manner of deep fried food.
sentences.chinese: 他們是嚴格的食素者，喫各種各樣的油炸食品。

sentences.english: The languages were severely suppressed in education by the Japanese government.
sentences.chinese: 日本政府嚴格限制了琉球語在學校的教學和使用。

sentences.english: The fine structure parameters were calculated using a least-squares fitting procedure.
sentences.chinese: 用最小二乘法擬合技術嚴格地計算了精細結構參數。

sentences.english: Be strictly compliance with laws and regulations, and to ensure food safety from product design.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格遵守法律法規，食品安全從產品設計抓起。

sentences.english: Results The rehabilitation treatment after TKR is very satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 結果術後嚴格的康復治療取得了滿意的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Capable of strictly abiding by the stipulations on the printing of invoices and the production and management of special products for anti-fake invoices.
sentences.chinese: 能嚴格遵守發票印製和發票防僞專用品生產管理規定。

sentences.english: The teacher is strict with his students and in his work.
sentences.chinese: 這位老師對他的學生要求嚴格，對工作要求也嚴。

sentences.english: The indicting condition of civil lawsuit is exact in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我國民事訴訟的起訴條件比較嚴格，對當事人不公平。

sentences.english: After arriving in Switzerland, the imported raw cocoa is subject to a strict quality control.
sentences.chinese: 當可可豆到達瑞士後，將要進行嚴格的質控程序。

sentences.english: The domain level focuses strictly on business interactions viewed from the perspective of the external actor.
sentences.chinese: 域層次嚴格集中在從外部演員的角度看到的業務交互。

sentences.english: The goods supplied shall only be those of best quality.
sentences.chinese: 本公司的產品製造有極嚴格的品質管制。

sentences.english: Thus, in the ordinary course of warehousing, the temptations to embezzle are strictly limited.
sentences.chinese: 所以在普通倉庫的運作中，侵佔的誘惑被嚴格限制了。

sentences.english: This, in turn, may cause more page breaks than are strictly necessary.
sentences.chinese: 這進而會導致一些嚴格說來不必要的換頁。

sentences.english: They discover that the new teacher is a martinet.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現新來的老師非常嚴格。

sentences.english: IX. Strictly stick to the handing-over system.
sentences.chinese: 第九條嚴格執行交接班制度。

sentences.english: The most stringent environmental protection measures in China's railway construction history have been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 採取鐵路建設史上最嚴格的環保措施。
